document_data.name: Girding of the Guard
document_data.mainbody: The '''Girding of the Guard''' was a religeous ceremony observed by worshipers of [[Horus-Re]], the Lord of the Sun within the [[Mulhorandi pantheon]].
document_data.Description: The Girding of the Guard was one of three daily rituals performed by [[priest]]s of Horus-Re. This ceremony occurred every night and priests of Horus-Re pledge to protect [[Mulhorand]] by holding their own private ceremony in which ceremonial weapons were girded.
